author: LF Martins
comment: Finally a good ana/digi watch face for square smartwatches! Please make the black version really "black"(I think it makes it easier to read in direct sunlight). Other than this, it's beautiful and works, no background services to use phone's memory, etc. Thank you!

author: ed m
comment: dont work moto 360

author: Joel G
comment: Finally a beautiful display for square watch faces.
title: Square

author: Sindre Moen
comment: Looks decent enough. Somewhat annoying that it takes up two slots in the face selector menu, but depending on how often you change watch face, that might be OK. What bugged me the most was that the round faces seem actually flatten out at the bottom, so now my LG G Watch R has the same bezel at the bottom that the Moto 360 has.
title: Alright

author: Tee Isme
comment: I'm using the basic black square watch face and I gotta say, it looks pretty nice. My favorite aspect is that it displays both analog and digital clocks one one face, along with the date (and seconds when tapped).
title: Looking good on LG G watch

author: Lloyd Songne
comment: Good looking watch faces, but I think there should be an ability to customize the faces when it comes to weather, battery levels, digital clock appearance, etc.
title: No customization options

author: Eric Rupe
comment: Why does it have to say leather watch? Looks so stupid. Please remove those words
title: Looks good

author: Bryce Wilson
comment: Would like too see more options and user customization such as adding weather in place of leather watch words...ability change hand colors... ability to adjust length it remains in bright mode.
title: Awesome watchface

author: Paul McManus
comment: Looks nice... but boy, does it eat battery. Other faces get me 50% longer battery life.
title: Battery eater

author: Travista Carrington
comment: This face is perfect for the LG G watch . I would like to see more functionality but a beautiful face.
title: One of the best for LG G watch R

author: Ray Henderson
comment: Great work you have done thanks heaps
title: Looks Gr8 On Lg g watch r

author: Rajesh Raju
comment: When I installed for moto 360..it is showing square face

author: aniruddha kumbhojkar
comment: better designs with passions
title: best

author: Tomas D.
comment: Has everything you need. Date with year and battery indicator. Must have for Moto 360
title: A++, even better than other one

author: Jim Schallert
comment: How about adding pedometer steps?  Look is clean but could have a bit more.
title: Nice but could be better

author: M Whip
comment: Nice, one free watch face.

author: Richard Foss
comment: Works well with notifications
title: Nice

author: Kevin Schwarz
comment: A slight improvement would be to add the day of the week to it. Also, perhaps it should say something besides "leather watch" on the bottom. But overall, a good watch face.
title: Good watch face

author: Brandon Bristol
comment: Battery indicator is a nice touch. I wish it didn't say leather watch at the bottom though
title: Nice

author: Emmanuel Otchere
comment: Not impressed!

author: Jorge Irribarra
comment: I bought all the 6 premium designs.. The problem is when my Moto 360 wakes up from sleep.. It does it in the black theme.. Then few seconds later the faces chances to the actual color theme that I selected in the phone.. It gets odd.. Please fix the glitch so I can enjoy my premium  colors that I paid for...Problem fixed..  Check your settings and un check the battery savings mode.. 5 stars from me beautiful apps,  Great developer support..

reply.author: collamo
reply.content:
Thank you using this app.
In this moment, you can go to settings to turn off "Energy Safe Mode".
That should prevent from displaying the dim theme when watch wakes sleep.

title: Beautiful and Functional watch faces

author: Nick Hidalgo
comment: This is everything I have wanted in a watch face. Dial, date, battery indicator, and digital time. Only issue is app will only display military time even with standard time setting selected.
title: Liked it

author: Shayne Barr
comment: I wanted a simple a watch face with the time, date and battery meter visible when cards were displayed. This watch face provides these features in style. It would be helpful to have the date in a little larger font. I think this could be achieved while maintaining balance with the battery meter. Great work overall.
title: Looks and works great on the Moto360

author: Michael J
comment: Works, but app on phone keeps indicating it died suddenly.
title: Works but buggy

author: Ramon Vizcarra
comment: It's simple but the layout is not for me.
title: I tried it but its not for me.

author: Ross Wilson
comment: The "round: still has edges on it;  looks like they simply blacked portions of the 'normal' mode.  The face does not fit the watch face, the text is poor quality and hard to read.  Not worth anything.

reply.author: collamo
reply.content: Please check the latest version. You can find round face selection on your watch, and it should be fixed now.

title: Does not fit 360, poor rendering

author: David Poff
comment: Looks great but settings for round don't seem to work which makes it less useful for 360 users. 5 stars when that's fixed.

reply.author: collamo
reply.content: Please check the latest version. You can find round face selection on your watch, and it should be fixed now.

title: Moto 360 issue

comment: The round themes do not fill the screen, leaving a black square border on left, top and right sides... 5* when fixed. Can't wait

reply.author: collamo
reply.content: Please check the latest version. You can find round face selection on your watch, and it should be fixed now.

title: Round doesn't work

author: Adam B
comment: Looks alright but make the words at the bottom of the fact removable or customisable. It would also be better without the white battery icon in the left corner.
title: Not bad

author: Scott Cole
comment: FINALLY a watch face that is pleasing to the eye AND puts all the info where it needs to be. Even with cards on the screen, I know the date, time of day and battery status. Nicely done!
title: Aesthetically Pleasing AND Practical

author: Patrick Dempsey
comment: Displays square face

reply.author: collamo
reply.content: Please check the latest version. You can find round face selection on your watch, and it should be fixed now.

title: Doesn't work on Moto360

author: Aaron Louthan
comment: Works well, but ended up switching to a different watch face.  What I found most appealing was that the tic marks took into account the light sensor placement on the Moto360, & the added battery indicator.  It will likely sound nitpicky, but here is what would have kept me using this watch face: 1.) Smoother second hand animation. 2.) Option to remove 'Leather Watch' branding from the face. 3.) Text were a bit more bold/crisp on the Moto 360 display.
title: Pleasant Design

author: Dominick Redo
comment: These are some great watch faces. However why should I be forced to look at the app in the app drawer. I understand you want to have the paid colors. Great. Find a better way besides cluttering the app drawer.
title: Why oh why.

author: Dominic Barrios
comment: I agree with other comments..  It does look good on G watch R however,  it'd be great to just remove the words leather watch and/or an option on how to display the date.  That'd make it 5 stars
title: LG G watch R

author: Ryan Habbeshaw
comment: Round doesn't work

reply.author: collamo
reply.content: Please check the latest version. You can find round face selection on your watch, and it should be fixed now.

title: Doesn't work for Moto 360

author: sandra hobson
comment: Can't get it 2 work. ...

author: Mark Upcraft
comment: Crashes my watch.

author: Steve Matsui
comment: I liked a lot about this face but Im not a fan of the 24hour format
title: Needs 12hr format

author: neil jobanputra
comment: Perfect for moto 360
title: Very nice

author: May Jl
comment: Look great on moto 360
